choices.name: Back
choices.tip: BACK ROW.  This offers the most protection from flying attacks, but you likely won't collect falling treats.  Gives priority for buildings abilities and Extract.

choices.name: Mid
choices.tip: MIDDLE ROW.  A balanced position.  Back row will have priority using buildings. Front row will take hits from flying attacks and collect falling treats first.

choices.name: Forward
choices.tip: FRONT ROW.  Stand here to collect all falling treats, but prepared to be hit by flying attacks too.  Not good for using buildings.

choices.name: Do Slash
choices.tip: SLASH: Slash at your foe.  This move will interrupt Building abilities.  If your foe Retaliates, though, expect it to hurt!
